20101229075553.000|20101229075553.000|CC1|         SOME PEOPLE HAD

20101229075555.000|20101229075557.000|CC1|      HOSTILITY, AGITATION,     
20101229075557.000|20101229075557.000|CC1|   DEPRESSED MOOD AND SUICIDAL

20101229075559.000|20101229075559.000|CC1|           WHILE TAKING         
20101229075559.000|20101229075602.000|CC1|    OR AFTER STOPPING CHANTIX.  
20101229075602.000|20101229075602.000|CC1|       IF YOU NOTICE ANY OF     
20101229075602.000|20101229075604.000|CC1|   THESE SYMPTOMS OR BEHAVIORS, 
20101229075604.000|20101229075604.000|CC1|   STOP TAKING CHANTIX AND CALL 
20101229075604.000|20101229075606.000|CC1|     YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY.

20101229075608.000|20101229075608.000|CC1|             OR OTHER

20101229082516.000|20101229082518.000|CC1|WHAT DO YOU REMEMBER OF THAT?   
20101229082518.000|20101229082519.000|CC1|THAT WAS A TREMENDOUS           
20101229082519.000|20101229082520.000|CC1|EXPERIENCE.                     
20101229082520.000|20101229082521.000|CC1|>> BEING FOUR, YOU DON'T RETAIN 
20101229082521.000|20101229082522.000|CC1|A LOT OF IT.                    
20101229082522.000|20101229082526.000|CC1|>> Dave: YEAH, I GUESS SO.      
20101229082526.000|20101229082528.000|CC1|>> BUT IT CONTRIBUTES TO MY     
20101229082528.000|20101229082529.000|CC1|PRETENSIONS OF HAVING A KIND    
20101229082529.000|20101229082530.000|CC1|OF, YOU KNOW, ETHNIC BACKGROUND 
20101229082530.000|20101229082534.000|CC1|AND DIVERSITY OF INTERESTS.     
20101229082534.000|20101229082535.000|CC1|>> Dave: CERTAINLY LOOKS GOOD ON
20101229082535.000|20101229082536.000|CC1|THE RESUME, FOR HEAVEN'S SAKES. 
20101229082536.000|20101229082537.000|CC1|>> IT DOES.                     
20101229082537.000|20101229082538.000|CC1|>> Dave: WAS IT FROM NIGERIA TO 
20101229082538.000|20101229082541.000|CC1|ST. LOUIS?                      
20101229082541.000|20101229082544.000|CC1|>> NO, IT WAS NIGERIA TO ST.    
20101229082544.000|20101229082545.000|CC1|LOUIS VIA BRENTWOOD, EAST       
20101229082545.000|20101229082547.000|CC1|LONDON, BILLERICA, BATH.        
20101229082547.000|20101229082548.000|CC1|WE WERE-- WE MOVED AROUND A     
20101229082548.000|20101229082550.000|CC1|GREAT DEAL.                     
20101229082550.000|20101229082550.000|CC1|I DIDN'T MAKE IT TO ST. LOUIS   
20101229082550.000|20101229082553.000|CC1|UNTIL 1972.                     
20101229082553.000|20101229082555.000|CC1|>> Dave: WHAT TOOK YOU THERE,   
20101229082555.000|20101229082555.000|CC1|WAS IT YOUR DAD'S JOB?          
20101229082555.000|20101229082556.000|CC1|>> MY PARENTS WERE ALWAYS       
20101229082556.000|20101229082557.000|CC1|INTERESTED IN TRAVELING.        
20101229082557.000|20101229082558.000|CC1|THEY WERE RAISED...             
20101229082558.000|20101229082559.000|CC1|BORN AND RAISED IN INDIA.       
20101229082559.000|20101229082600.000|CC1|MY MOTHER GREW UP PARTLY IN     
20101229082600.000|20101229082601.000|CC1|IOWA.                           
20101229082601.000|20101229082603.000|CC1|IT'S FAR TOO LONG A STORY FOR   
20101229082603.000|20101229082605.000|CC1|THE TIME WE HAVE, SO I'M GLAZING
20101229082605.000|20101229082606.000|CC1|OVER IT.                        
20101229082606.000|20101229082607.000|CC1|>> Dave: DID YOU SAY IOWA?      
20101229082607.000|20101229082607.000|CC1|YOU SAID IOWA?                  
20101229082607.000|20101229082608.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101229082608.000|20101229082609.000|CC1|>> Dave: IOWA, WOW.             
20101229082609.000|20101229082610.000|CC1|>> WHICH WAS WONDERFUL.         
20101229082610.000|20101229082611.000|CC1|>> Dave: INDIA TO IOWA.         
20101229082611.000|20101229082612.000|CC1|>> YEAH, INDIA, IOWA, AND       
20101229082612.000|20101229082613.000|CC1|BILLY-RICKY WHICH MEANS NOTHING 
20101229082613.000|20101229082614.000|CC1|TO YOU.                         
20101229082614.000|20101229082615.000|CC1|IF THERE ARE ANY ENGLISH        
20101229082615.000|20101229082617.000|CC1|VIEWERS, THEY'LL BE TICKLED...  
20101229082617.000|20101229082617.000|CC1|>> Dave: NOT MUCH MEANS ANYTHING
20101229082617.000|20101229082619.000|CC1|TO ME ANYMORE.                  
20101229082619.000|20101229082620.000|CC1|BUT TELL ME ABOUT YOUR          
20101229082620.000|20101229082621.000|CC1|EXPERIENCE IN THE UNITED STATES.
20101229082621.000|20101229082623.000|CC1|>> WELL, IT WAS THE BEST YEAR OF
20101229082623.000|20101229082625.000|CC1|MY CHILDHOOD AND ALSO, IN SOME  
20101229082625.000|20101229082627.000|CC1|WAYS, THE MOST CHALLENGING.     
20101229082627.000|20101229082629.000|CC1|I WAS-- IN ENGLAND, YOU KNOW, WE
20101229082629.000|20101229082632.000|CC1|START FIRST GRADE A YEAR LATER  
20101229082632.000|20101229082634.000|CC1|THAN THE AMERICANS, SO SOME     
20101229082634.000|20101229082635.000|CC1|PEOPLE THOUGHT THE WISDOM WOULD 
20101229082635.000|20101229082638.000|CC1|BE TO PUT ME IN A YEAR OF OLDER 
20101229082638.000|20101229082640.000|CC1|KIDS JUST BECAUSE I WOULD BE SO 
20101229082640.000|20101229082642.000|CC1|ADVANCED.                       
20101229082642.000|20101229082644.000|CC1|FRANKLY, THE REVERSE WAS TRUE.  
20101229082644.000|20101229082645.000|CC1|I WAS THE MOST UNSOPHISTICATED  
20101229082645.000|20101229082646.000|CC1|KID IN THE SCHOOL.              
20101229082646.000|20101229082647.000|CC1|I HAD JUST COME OUT OF THE      
20101229082647.000|20101229082649.000|CC1|EQUIVALENT OF ELEMENTARY        
20101229082649.000|20101229082650.000|CC1|EDUCATION, WHICH MEANT I HAD    
20101229082650.000|20101229082651.000|CC1|BEEN WEARING LITTLE GRAY SHORTS,
20101229082651.000|20101229082654.000|CC1|I HAD GRASS STAINS ON MY KNEES. 
20101229082654.000|20101229082656.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, I WAS SORT OF LEARNING
20101229082656.000|20101229082658.000|CC1|HOW TO KICK A BALL AROUND.      
20101229082658.000|20101229082659.000|CC1|I WAS-- INSTEAD OF SEVENTH      
20101229082659.000|20101229082700.000|CC1|GRADE, I WAS IN THE EIGHTH      
20101229082700.000|20101229082701.000|CC1|GRADE.                          
20101229082701.000|20101229082704.000|CC1|I WAS PRE-PUBERTY.              
20101229082704.000|20101229082706.000|CC1|THESE KIDS SEEMED TO BE WELL    
20101229082706.000|20101229082708.000|CC1|INTO PUBERTY.                   
20101229082708.000|20101229082709.000|CC1|AND THE DRESS CODE WAS VERY     
20101229082709.000|20101229082711.000|CC1|DIFFERENT.                      
20101229082711.000|20101229082712.000|CC1|THEY WERE IN COMBAT JACKETS WITH
20101229082712.000|20101229082721.000|CC1|PEACE SLOGANS ON THE BACK.      
20101229082721.000|20101229082721.000|CC1|AND THE VERNACULAR WAS          
20101229082721.000|20101229082722.000|CC1|UNFAMILIAR TO ME.               
20101229082722.000|20101229082723.000|CC1|>> Dave: ( LAUGHING )           
20101229082723.000|20101229082724.000|CC1|>> THERE WERE REFERENCES TO     
20101229082724.000|20101229082725.000|CC1|RECREATIONAL ITEMS AND          
20101229082725.000|20101229082728.000|CC1|ACTIVITIES THAT MEANT NOTHING.  
20101229082728.000|20101229082729.000|CC1|AND YOU KNOW, THERE WERE WORDS  
20101229082729.000|20101229082731.000|CC1|AND DESCRIPTIONS OF THINGS,     
20101229082731.000|20101229082732.000|CC1|WHICH I THOUGHT, "WHY WOULD     
20101229082732.000|20101229082733.000|CC1|PEOPLE DO THAT?"                
20101229082733.000|20101229082737.000|CC1|IT MADE NO SENSE.               
20101229082737.000|20101229082739.000|CC1|THE KIDS THAT I WAS WITH        
20101229082739.000|20101229082741.000|CC1|PROBABLY DIDN'T KNOW ANY BETTER 
20101229082741.000|20101229082742.000|CC1|THAN I DID WHAT THE WORDS MEANT,
20101229082742.000|20101229082743.000|CC1|EITHER.                         
20101229082743.000|20101229082744.000|CC1|>> Dave: DID IT TAKE LONG TO    
20101229082744.000|20101229082745.000|CC1|KIND OF CATCH UP?               
20101229082745.000|20101229082746.000|CC1|I'M GUESSING IT DIDN'T TAKE THAT
20101229082746.000|20101229082747.000|CC1|LONG TO CATCH UP?               
20101229082747.000|20101229082749.000|CC1|>> IT DIDN'T TAKE THAT LONG, BUT
20101229082749.000|20101229082751.000|CC1|IT WAS...                       
20101229082751.000|20101229082751.000|CC1|I WAS...                        
20101229082751.000|20101229082753.000|CC1|IT WAS TOO LATE FOR ME TO PROFIT
20101229082753.000|20101229082758.000|CC1|FROM IT IN THIS COUNTRY.        
20101229082758.000|20101229082759.000|CC1|>> Dave: WELL THAT'S TOO BAD.   
20101229082759.000|20101229082801.000|CC1|>> MY DEVELOPMENT DIDN'T REALLY 
20101229082801.000|20101229082803.000|CC1|KICK IN UNTIL I WENT BACK HOME. 
20101229082803.000|20101229082805.000|CC1|IT WAS MUCH DULLER BACK THERE.  
20101229082805.000|20101229082805.000|CC1|>> Dave: I NEVER THOUGHT OF IT  
20101229082805.000|20101229082807.000|CC1|IN THOSE TERMS.                 
20101229082807.000|20101229082808.000|CC1|BUT SEVENTH TO EIGHTH GRADE,    
20101229082808.000|20101229082809.000|CC1|IT'S VERY DIFFERENT, CULTURALLY,
20101229082809.000|20101229082810.000|CC1|AS WELL AS PHYSICALLY AND       
20101229082810.000|20101229082811.000|CC1|EMOTIONALLY.                    
20101229082811.000|20101229082812.000|CC1|>> IN MY CASE, THE DIFFERENCE   
20101229082812.000|20101229082814.000|CC1|WAS IMMEASURABLE.               
20101229082814.000|20101229082815.000|CC1|I THINK I'M PROBABLY STILL      
20101229082815.000|20101229082816.000|CC1|TRYING TO MAKE IT INTO THE      
20101229082816.000|20101229082817.000|CC1|EIGHTH GRADE.                   
20101229082817.000|20101229082818.000|CC1|>> Dave: YEAH, I UNDERSTAND WHAT
20101229082818.000|20101229082819.000|CC1|YOU'RE SAYING.                  
20101229082819.000|20101229082821.000|CC1|AS JERRY WOULD SAY, THAT SUCKS. 
20101229082821.000|20101229082823.000|CC1|WE'LL BE RIGHT BACK WITH COLIN

20101229083216.000|20101229083220.000|CC1|FATHER WHO IS AN ACTOR.         
20101229083220.000|20101229083221.000|CC1|>> Dave: WHAT IS THAT LIKE FOR  
20101229083221.000|20101229083223.000|CC1|THE KIDS?

20101229083231.000|20101229083233.000|CC1|PROUD OF YOUR WORK.             
20101229083233.000|20101229083236.000|CC1|DO THEY GO SEE YOUR MOVIES?     
20101229083236.000|20101229083237.000|CC1|>> WE TRIED TO KIND OF STOP THAT
20101229083237.000|20101229083239.000|CC1|HAPPENING FOR A WHILE.          
20101229083239.000|20101229083240.000|CC1|BUT REMEMBER WHAT IT MIGHT BE   
20101229083240.000|20101229083242.000|CC1|LIKE TO HAVE A DAD WHO IS IN    
20101229083242.000|20101229083245.000|CC1|"MAMMA MIA," YOU KNOW?          
20101229083245.000|20101229083245.000|CC1|>> Dave: OKAY.                  
20101229083245.000|20101229083246.000|CC1|ALL RIGHT.                      
20101229083246.000|20101229083247.000|CC1|>> YOU HAVE TO FACE YOUR        
20101229083247.000|20101229083248.000|CC1|CLASSMATES WHEN YOU HAVE A      
20101229083248.000|20101229083249.000|CC1|FATHER IN SPANDEX AND HIGH      
20101229083249.000|20101229083252.000|CC1|HEELS.                          
20101229083252.000|20101229083254.000|CC1|MY NINE-YEAR-OLD, WHEN HE FIRST 
20101229083254.000|20101229083255.000|CC1|VISITED THE SET, HE WAS THREE   
20101229083255.000|20101229083259.000|CC1|OR FOUR YEARS OLD.              
20101229083259.000|20101229083259.000|CC1|HE SAW ALL THESE CRANES AND     
20101229083259.000|20101229083300.000|CC1|THOUGHT I WORKED IN             
20101229083300.000|20101229083302.000|CC1|CONSTRUCTION.                   
20101229083302.000|20101229083302.000|CC1|OF COURSE, I NURTURED THAT      
20101229083302.000|20101229083304.000|CC1|IMPRESSION.                     
20101229083304.000|20101229083305.000|CC1|>> Dave: SURE.                  
20101229083305.000|20101229083305.000|CC1|>> HOW WAS I GOING TO BREAK IT  
20101229083305.000|20101229083306.000|CC1|TO HIM?                         
20101229083306.000|20101229083307.000|CC1|WE'D BE DRIVING THROUGH         
20101229083307.000|20101229083309.000|CC1|LONDON, AND HE'D SEE A BUILDING 
20101229083309.000|20101229083310.000|CC1|SITE AND A CRANE AND SAY, "IS   
20101229083310.000|20101229083311.000|CC1|THAT WHERE YOU WORK, DAD?"      
20101229083311.000|20101229083312.000|CC1|"THAT'S RIGHT SON, I PUT THE    
20101229083312.000|20101229083313.000|CC1|HARD HAT ON EVERY MORNING AND   
20101229083313.000|20101229083314.000|CC1|I'M OUT THERE..."               
20101229083314.000|20101229083316.000|CC1|IT'S NOT AS IF I HAVE TO PUT ON 
20101229083316.000|20101229083316.000|CC1|A FROCK AND A BIT OF EYELINER   
20101229083316.000|20101229083320.000|CC1|EVERY DAY.                      
20101229083320.000|20101229083321.000|CC1|>> Dave: NO, NO.                
20101229083321.000|20101229083322.000|CC1|OPPOSITE END OF THE SPECTRUM.   
20101229083322.000|20101229083323.000|CC1|>> HE'S STILL RECOVERING FROM   
20101229083323.000|20101229083324.000|CC1|THAT REVELATION.                
20101229083324.000|20101229083325.000|CC1|>> Dave: EXPLAIN TO ME AND      
20101229083325.000|20101229083328.000|CC1|EVERYBODY ELSE ABOUT THIS FILM, 
20101229083328.000|20101229083331.000|CC1|AND IT INVOLVES ROYALTY.        
20101229083331.000|20101229083332.000|CC1|IT'S KING GEORGE VI...          
20101229083332.000|20101229083333.000|CC1|>> THE SIXTH.                   
20101229083333.000|20101229083333.000|CC1|>> Dave: IS THAT RIGHT?         
20101229083333.000|20101229083334.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT.                
20101229083334.000|20101229083336.000|CC1|>> Dave: DIFFICULTY.            
20101229083336.000|20101229083338.000|CC1|WAS IT STAGE FRIGHT OR SOMETHING
20101229083338.000|20101229083339.000|CC1|ELSE THAT WAS COMPOUNDED BY     
20101229083339.000|20101229083341.000|CC1|STUTTERING...?                  
20101229083341.000|20101229083342.000|CC1|>> IT WAS SOMETHING ELSE THAT   
20101229083342.000|20101229083344.000|CC1|WAS COMPOUNDED BY STAGE FRIGHT. 
20101229083344.000|20101229083347.000|CC1|HE SUFFERED FROM A TERRIBLE     
20101229083347.000|20101229083348.000|CC1|STUTTER, WHICH WAS SO           
20101229083348.000|20101229083350.000|CC1|DEBILITATING THAT HE REALLY     
20101229083350.000|20101229083350.000|CC1|DIDN'T FEEL COMFORTABLE         
20101229083350.000|20101229083351.000|CC1|COMPLETING A SENTENCE IN ANY    
20101229083351.000|20101229083352.000|CC1|ONE'S COMPANY, LET ALONE        
20101229083352.000|20101229083353.000|CC1|PUBLICLY.                       
20101229083353.000|20101229083354.000|CC1|AND HIS BROTHER SUDDENLY GAVE UP
20101229083354.000|20101229083355.000|CC1|THE JOB.                        
20101229083355.000|20101229083356.000|CC1|HIS BROTHER WAS SUPPOSED TO BE  
20101229083356.000|20101229083357.000|CC1|KING, NOT HIM.                  
20101229083357.000|20101229083358.000|CC1|AND FAMOUSLY, HE ABDICATED...   
20101229083358.000|20101229083400.000|CC1|FOR LOVE.                       
20101229083400.000|20101229083402.000|CC1|AND SUDDENLY, IT WAS THE        
20101229083402.000|20101229083407.000|CC1|BROTHER'S JOB TO BE KING.       
20101229083407.000|20101229083409.000|CC1|AND THIS MEANT BASICALLY PUBLIC 
20101229083409.000|20101229083411.000|CC1|SPEAKING WITH A LIVE MICROPHONE 
20101229083411.000|20101229083414.000|CC1|TO AN ENTIRE EMPIRE.            
20101229083414.000|20101229083416.000|CC1|AND IT'S NOT EXACTLY A CHOICE   
20101229083416.000|20101229083417.000|CC1|PROFESSION IF YOU HAVE          
20101229083417.000|20101229083419.000|CC1|DIFFICULTY SPEAKING.            
20101229083419.000|20101229083420.000|CC1|SO IT WAS TERRIFYING.           
20101229083420.000|20101229083422.000|CC1|ALSO IT WAS ON THE BRINK OF     
20101229083422.000|20101229083424.000|CC1|WORLD WAR II, AND HIS           
20101229083424.000|20101229083425.000|CC1|ADVERSARIES, HITLER AND         
20101229083425.000|20101229083426.000|CC1|MUSSOLINI, WERE ABOUT THE BEST  
20101229083426.000|20101229083427.000|CC1|IN THE BUSINESS WHEN IT COMES TO
20101229083427.000|20101229083430.000|CC1|RHETORIC.                       
20101229083430.000|20101229083432.000|CC1|HAD HE BEEN BORN A GENERATION   
20101229083432.000|20101229083433.000|CC1|EARLIER, OR A GENERATION LATER, 
20101229083433.000|20101229083434.000|CC1|HE COULD HAVE BEEN RECORDED AND 
20101229083434.000|20101229083436.000|CC1|EDITED.                         
20101229083436.000|20101229083437.000|CC1|BUT HE HAD TO FALL INTO THAT    
20101229083437.000|20101229083438.000|CC1|INTERLUDE.                      
20101229083438.000|20101229083440.000|CC1|>> Dave: HOW IS HE REGARDED BY  
20101229083440.000|20101229083442.000|CC1|HISTORIANS NOW, AS...?          
20101229083442.000|20101229083443.000|CC1|>> WELL, INTERESTINGLY ENOUGH,  
20101229083443.000|20101229083444.000|CC1|HE'S NOT THOUGHT ABOUT THAT     
20101229083444.000|20101229083446.000|CC1|MUCH.
